item.title: WebGL tutorial: image processing
item.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to use WebGL for image processing. We will cover basic stuff like initialization, texture loading, and simple fragment shaders. I will try to cover all aspects of interaction with WebGL but you should have a decent understanding of vanilla javascript. If you want more in-depth explanations, there is a good book called “Learn WebGL”, check it out.
